description: What’s your secret? Listen as anonymous callers from across the globe share what is hidden in their lives. It’s both a voyeuristic and affirming experience. Leave your own at 1-929-SECRETS (929-732-7387) or secretshotline.org.

items.content:
Happy Halloween, everrybody!

items.title: A Keen Sense of De-Reality

items.content:
Listeners grapple with the biggest secret of generations: climate change.


LEAVE A SECRET!

secretshotline.org or 929-SECRETS


GENERATION DREAD!

https://gendread.substack.com/


PLAYLIST!

Pulse Mandala & Distant Fires Burning - R Abacus Lndr - Oblivion in Qbit

Strangebird~Sounds - Lavender River - Surface Dust

Strangebird~Sounds - Lavender River - Momentarily

Pulse Mandala & Distant Fires Burning - R Abacus Lndr - Spectroscopycon

Interspecifics - La Inmanencia del Ser - Reducción


DONATE!

https://loveandradio.org/member


¡SECRETOS EN ESPAÑOL!

https://canalconfidente.org

items.title: Hard Memories

items.content:
A caller accidentally makes herself racist, one bong hit solves a world of problems, what to do when a stranger makes incidental contact on the bus, and more!

items.title: Giving It Another Go

itunes.author: Love and Radio
itunes.summary: What’s your secret? Listen as anonymous callers from across the globe share what is hidden in their lives. It’s both a voyeuristic and affirming experience. Leave your own at 1-929-SECRETS (929-732-7387) or secretshotline.org.

title: The Secrets Hotline
